I was trying to collect the self-destruct mechanism out of one of the KAS boxes, but it wouldn't let me.

I've tested this in .22 with the most recent KAS and TACSD versions as of the 30th of November. Please let me know if your versions and mine aren't the same.
It was on the latest version of .22 with both KAS and TACSD at their up-to-date levels (before the .23 update).

Changes

  • Updated to 0.23
  • The Time Delay and whether to allow staging are both now changeable in game thanks to tweakables.

Note that I removed the second part because it is redundant. If you are using it on any of your vessels:

  1. Backup your persistent.sfs file.
  2. Open the persistent.sfs file in your favorite editor, and replace every instance of "TacSelfDestruct_Stagable" with "TacSelfDestruct"

Download from http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/tac-self-destruct-2/
